<noinclude>
Single release entry for the releases section.

== Parameters ==
* '''version''' — release tag (e.g., "v5.1.0")
* '''date''' — release date (e.g., "2024-12-15")
* '''notes''' — short release notes summary
* '''url''' — link to GitHub release page

== Usage ==
<pre>
{{GitHubRelease|version=v5.1.0|date=2024-12-15|notes=Bug fixes and performance improvements|url=https://github.com/dreamfactorysoftware/dreamfactory/releases/tag/5.1.0}}
</pre>
</noinclude><includeonly><div class="mp-release-entry">
<div class="mp-release-header">
<span class="mp-release-version">[{{{url}}} {{{version}}}]</span>
<span class="mp-release-date">{{{date}}}</span>
</div>
<div class="mp-release-notes">{{{notes}}}</div>
</div></includeonly>
